title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Analyze and design a propulsion system for a spacecraft. This includes thrust calculation, fuel efficiency, and nozzle design.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Perform detailed combustion analysis for rocket fuels, focusing on chemical reactions, energy release, and exhaust products.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design an optimal nozzle for a rocket engine. The assignment includes computational fluid dynamics (CFD) analysis of nozzle shapes.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: A quiz covering fundamental principles of aerodynamics, including airfoil theory, lift and drag forces, and flow behavior.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Conduct a comprehensive analysis of airflow around different geometries using both theoretical and simulation techniques.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Investigate heat transfer mechanisms in aerospace structures under various conditions, including convection, conduction, and radiation.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design and analyze the structural components of a satellite. Focus on weight optimization and load-bearing capabilities.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Calculate satellite orbits using Kepler's laws. This includes determining orbital elements and plotting orbital paths.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: An exam focused on systems engineering concepts, including requirements analysis, systems integration, and project lifecycle management.
